ygData.subject: RE: SK Quest armor (Questions and spoiler/rumors)
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I m still looking for info on the SK armor and in my searching s I came across what is being required for the new Bard armor. If it s similar it shouldn t
ygData.messageBody:
Well I'm still looking for info on the SK armor and in my searching's I came
across what is being required for the new Bard armor. If it's similar it
shouldn't be that hard. The only part I see people having problems with is
getting the pieces off of the HG's, SG's or Griffins.. Hopefully the SK
quest will be similar.. Still wondering if it will be better than Mithril
though, oh well guess I'll find out soon enough..

On another subject anybody else besides me seem to be carrying a lot of
weapons around lately? Just realized last night that I have 3 different
weapons on me at any given time...(Thank god for EE sacks..)..

Enjoy


-----Original Message-----
From: Chip Paul [mailto:cpaul@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 12, 1999 10:57 AM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] SK Quest armor (Questions and spoiler/rumors)


From: Chip Paul <cpaul@...>

Does anyone on the list play on the Test Server? I've heard that the
new quest armor was broken on Test, but I assume will be fixed before
tomorrow. If anyone can post logs of talking to the quest giver I'd
love to hear it. Here's what I've heard:

The quest is given by a Greater Skeleton in the Graveyard of Mistmoore.
It requires pieces of Decayed Armor found off Lizard Crusaders in
Cazic Thule. I don't yet know what else is required, but I assume
that there is either more items or monetary components (metals or
gems) involved.

I have not seen stats or screenshots of how it looks. I can't
believe they made the rogue armor look like plate. It could have
the exact same stats, but I think black leather would have been
more fitting.

Xilith

-=The Shadow Knight Mailing List=-
-= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
